item.title: Road to Simplicity: Tests Are Not Tests [Part Two]
item.description: Intro This is the second post of Road to Simplicity. And it’s about the role of tests in software writing. (The first part is about the goal of the series and hexagonal architecture) Test and correctness I think that it’s inappropriate to associate test with verification of correctness. After all with a test we can verify that a software module (e.g. a function) returns an expected output with a given input.
